thread.title: Blue Global Media Promotes Financial Literacy
thread.title_full: Blue Global Media Promotes Financial Literacy - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Blue Global Media Promotes Financial Literacy
text:
Blue Global Media
Scottsdale company donates to organizations in support of lifelong financial success
SCOTTSDALE, Ariz. , Oct. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Promoting financial literacy for consumers is a key priority for Blue Global Media, an online marketing and lending company located in Scottsdale, Arizona . Recently the company began donating to financial literacy groups and initiatives in an effort to help set individuals up for lifelong financial success.
Blue Global Media has pledged support to the Jump$tart Coalition for Personal Financial Literacy , which brings together organizations that share a commitment to advancing financial literacy for preschool through college-age youth and collaborating to offer effective financial education. Funds provided by Blue Global will help support Jump$tart's 2015 National Educator Conference ( Nov. 6-8 ), the only national conference for teachers dedicated to personal finance education in PreK-12 classrooms. Each year, the conference provides educators with financial education resources, personal and professional development, access to a nationwide network of colleagues and general support for financial education.
"When you plant the roots of fiscal responsibility at an early age, you're building a strong foundation that will support a lifetime of financial independence," said Blue Global Media CEO and founder, Chris Kay . "Blue Global is proud to support Jump$tart and its National Educator Conference, knowing that it's giving teachers the tools and knowledge they need to start kids off on the right foot."
Locally, Blue Global Media also makes a monthly donation to the Valley of the Sun United Way , which strives to increase the financial stability of families and individuals throughout every community in the Valley. One of the organization's goals is to help 100,000 individuals achieve financial self-sufficiency in Maricopa County by 2020 through financial education and workforce preparation services.
"As a leader in the online lending space, it's important that we support sound financial practices at all levels," Kay said. "Along with fraud prevention, regulatory compliance and consumer protection, we have a vested interest in promoting financial literacy for individuals and helping them meet their long-term financial goals. It's important for us to partner with organizations like United Way, who through their efforts to put families on the path to financial independence, make a tangible and lasting impact on our communities."
About Blue Global Media
Scottsdale, Arizona -based Blue Global Media is a preeminent consumer loan lead generation company. Founded in 2006 by Chris Kay , the company has one of the largest networks of affiliates and provides its customers with quality, real-time leads. For more information about Blue Global Media, visit http://www.blueglobalmedia.com .
